EmailTemplate.description: [#EPH-7023] Notification: # sellers were not transfered to campaign members [Error]
EmailTemplate.name: RefreshMemberInfo
EmailTemplate.subject: Refresh Member Result for Campaign {!CampaignName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have uploaded {!CountSellerList} seller list(s) with {!CountTargetSeller} seller records to the Campaign {!CampaignName}.
{!CountCMCreated} Campaign Member(s) has (have) been created from these {!CountTargetSeller} seller records:
{!CountSellerOptOut} seller(s) did not migrate to Campaign Members due to being flagged for phone opt-out. {!BadSellerOther} seller(s) did not migrate to Campaign Members due to other reasons:
{!BadSellers}
